verses.roman:
e sāmānya, tryadhīśvarera śuna artha āra
jagat-kāraṇa tina puruṣāvatāra

synonyms: e sāmānya—this is a general description; tri-adhīśvarera—of the master of the three worlds; śuna—please hear; artha—meaning; āra—another; jagat-kāraṇa—the cause of the material creation; tina—three; puruṣa-avatāra—puruṣa incarnations of Viṣṇu.
translation: "This is only a general description. Please try to understand another meaning of tryadhīśa. The three puruṣa incarnations of Viṣṇu are the original cause of the material creation.
